title: 被捕港人家屬向世界求救(附中英文字幕)

replies.msg:
Families of 12 HK Youths Detained by China Cry Out to the World for Help被捕港人家屬向世界求救
https://youtu.be/zDnxKMgFNWA


#GoHKVideo #Save12HKYouths
Families of 12 HK Youths Detained by China Cry Out to the World for Help
被捕港人家屬向世界求救

The detainees' families spoke publicly on Sept 12, 2020, in company with HK legislators Chu Hoi-dick and James To.

The 12 Hongkongers were denied communications and their legal and human rights are undermined in China.

In this video with bilingual subtitles, we hope you can hear out the families' ongoing painful ordeal.

#HumanitarianCrisis
